text: Rusky Castle, also known as Ruskie Castle, is a ruined castle on an islet on Loch Rusky, Stirling, Scotland. The islet is now submerged. The castle was known to be held by Sir John de Menteith. ==Notes== Category:Ruined castles in Stirling (council area) Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 13th century Category:13th-century establishments in Scotland
title: Rusky Castle
